analysisEngineMetaData.name: EmptyAnnotator
analysisEngineMetaData.description: This descriptor file is here only because it is convenient to use with the CVD. If you pass the argument "-desc desc/util/EmptyAnnotator.xml" into the CAS Visual Debugger, then it will load the ClearTK type system. That way you don't need to do it manually and you can directly open an XCAS file. It is possible that they have/will make it possible to pass in the type system descriptor, in which case we will no longer need this descriptor as it is not used anywhere.
